plot: Loosely based on the life of the late Franz Kafka, Mayfly is a surreal drama about a shamed writer who discovers the idea for his next masterpiece in a twisted, unexpected way: the repellent image of a mayfly.
title: Mayfly
plot_es: Loosely based on the life of the late Franz Kafka, Mayfly is a surreal drama about a shamed writer who discovers the idea for his next masterpiece in a twisted, unexpected way: the repellent image of a mayfly.
plot_en: Loosely based on the life of the late Franz Kafka, Mayfly is a surreal drama about a shamed writer who discovers the idea for his next masterpiece in a twisted, unexpected way: the repellent image of a mayfly.
